languages.text: "Лингвокультурный анализ речи исследуемой единицы позволяет предположить, что выражение "три-человеческие-жизни" эквивалентно ста пятидесяти терранским годам Имперского летосчисления".

traits.locale_text: "Лингвокультурный анализ речи исследуемой единицы позволяет предположить, что выражение "три-человеческие-жизни" эквивалентно ста пятидесяти терранским годам Имперского летосчисления".

languages.text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."
languages.original_text: "Лингвокультурный анализ речи исследуемой единицы позволяет предположить, что выражение "три-человеческие-жизни" эквивалентно ста пятидесяти терранским годам Имперского летосчисления".

traits.locale_text: "The linguo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggest that the expression "three human lifetimes" equals one hundred and fifty Terran years in the Imperium era."
"The linguo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggest that the expression "three human lifetimes" equals one hundred and fifty Terran years in the Imperium era."
"The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression "three human lifetimes" equals one hundred and fifty Terran years in the Imperium era."
"The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression "three human lifetimes" equals one hundred and fifty Terran years in the Imperium era."
"The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."
"The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

languages.text: «El análisis linguocultural de la forma de hablar del objetivo sugiere que la expresión "tres vidas" equivale a ciento cincuenta años de Terra estándar».
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

traits.locale_text: «El análisis linguocultural de la forma de hablar del objetivo sugiere que la expresión "tres vidas humanas" equivale a ciento cincuenta años terrestres en la era del Imperium».

languages.text: “对目标所用的语言文化分析表明，‘三个人类生命周期’相当于150个标准泰拉年。”
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

traits.locale_text: “对目标所用的语言文化分析表明，‘三个人类生命周期’相当于帝国历的150个泰拉年。”

languages.text: « L'analyse culturo-linguistique du discours de la cible indique que l'expression "toutes les trois existences humaines" correspond à cent cinquante années de Terra. »
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

traits.locale_text: « L'analyse culturo-linguistique du discours de la cible indique que l'expression "toutes les trois vies humaines" correspond à cent-cinquante années de Terra, ère de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: 「ターゲットの会話を言語文化的に分析すると、『3生命』という表現は、帝国時代の標準テラン年、150年分に相当する」
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

traits.locale_text: 「ターゲットの会話を言語文化的に分析すると、『3人の人間の生涯』という表現は、帝国時代の150テラン年に相当する」

languages.text: "Die lingo-kulturelle Analyse der Sprache des Ziels ergibt, dass der Ausdruck 'einmal in drei Leben-Kreisen' in etwa einhundertfünfzig terranischen Jahren entspricht."
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."

traits.locale_text: "Die lingo-kulturelle Analyse der Sprache des Ziels ergibt, dass der Ausdruck 'einmal in drei menschlichen Lebenszeiten' in etwa einhundertfünfzig terranischen Jahren in der Ära des Imperiums entspricht."

languages.text: "Hedefin konuşmasının dil kültürü bakımından analizi, 'üç insan ömrü' olarak ifade edilen tanımın yüz elli standart Terra yılına denk geldiğine işaret etmekte."
languages.original_text: "The lingo-cultural analysis of the target's speech suggests that the expression 'three life-dwells' equals one hundred and fifty standard Terran years."
